text:
where can I run
``` var _hsp = (window._hsp = window._hsp || []);
_hsq.push(["doNotTrack"]);```
to be sure that no tracking info is sent to HubSpot?
Right now I have it inside of the settings version of "site footer HTML"
^ this seems to work but at some point additional HubSpot related cookies are created. Hopefully that doesn't mean that anything is sent to HubSpot while `doNotTrack` is set to `yes`

To my understanding, HubSpot still creates preference cookies for users who have opted out of tracking, but the cookies are only used to keep track of their opt-out status — it doesn’t collect or store information about those users.
